I think I found the issue in [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/efad1de04a1a0fbb49bb88f3b837235091329d96/tools/ign_TEST.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ign_TEST.cc-337) line.

I added that line to prevent the following situation:

* You compiled and installed and old library version.
* You compile and NOT install the current version. You want your tests to link against the current version under `build` and not against the old library installed.
